description: Source code for an agent that translates text, analyzes emotion, creates localized voices, and generates voice notes using Cartesia TTStools.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of executing tasks with specified tools and instructions.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response message from the agent.

methods.name: run_response
methods.description: Executes the agent's response process and returns the response object.
